title: Any help determing why pixel 2 falls off wifi constantly yet randomly?
content: Reboot, reset network settings, ditched all apps installed in the last 30 days (problem began a couple weeks ago) forgot the network and relearned, and rebooted again. I really don't want to go into the rabbit hole of refurbished junk that always has other problems that may or may not be bigger than what I currently have. It consistently yet randomly falls off Wi-Fi.
